projects.name: Helios Control
projects.tagline: Realtime shot orchestration for tokamak experiments
projects.description: A control-plane toolkit for scheduling pulse sequences, validating actuator constraints, and streaming deterministic machine events into archived experiment timelines.

projects.name: PlasmaScope
projects.description: An analysis console for magnetics, bolometry, and interferometry streams with synchronized replay and event annotation for post-shot review.

projects.name: FluxGraph
projects.tagline: Hybrid graph + vector retrieval for experiment logs
projects.description: A search engine that joins telemetry vectors with operator notes and procedural graphs to support failure-mode analysis and recovery planning.

projects.name: Neutron Ledger
projects.description: Run-centric documentation tools that map each machine state transition to context, outcomes, and reproducible operator steps.

projects.name: Q-Control Sandbox
projects.description: A simulation harness for testing policy candidates against synthetic drift, coil latency, and power-system uncertainty before on-device trials.

projects.name: Ignition Docs
projects.tagline: Knowledge base for fusion software teams
projects.description: A lightweight documentation portal with API snapshots, architecture maps, and operational checklists for new team onboarding.
